title: Nobody
lyrics:
Yo nobody said it be like this
Yo nobody said it be like this
Yo nobody said it be like this
Yo nobody said it be like this
Amudo naege malhaejuji anh-ass-eo
Nado mudji anh-ass-eo

Amudo naege mul-eoboji anh-ass-eo

Nado deudji anh-ass-eo



Jeomjeom modeun gamgag-i naleul tteonam gam-i sijaghagi jeon-e

Yeojeonhi chaj-a nae yeoghal

Eum-ag-i naleul chaj-anwass-eo geuge chiyuga doel jul mollassneunde

Geuttaen balo 19sal

Wae ginjanghae, mwoga minmanghae

Mal-eul deodeum-eodo naneun jeoldae du beon an malhae

1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

I don-eul semyeonseo nan dwaebeolyeossne susjaui noye

I’m tryna be the best

I’ll sleep when I’m dead

Ijen geongang chaeng-gilaneun maldo jichige hae

Aswibdaneun maldo jebal geumanhae

Ttaega doemyeon nae eolgul-eul alge doel jeon segye

Yeah everybody gon know Juno in time

Geunde wae gil-eun jeomjeom gapajigo issna

Olh-eun gyeoljeong-inji aninjineun nan moleugessjiman

Buyeojabgo issneun huimang



Eodug-eodughan bang-guseog-e honja anja

Dad-eun nae ib-eun

Kaldo beineun. saeng-gagdeul-eul kkaemul-eo malhago sip-eossjiman cham-a

Cuz I’m not a hater

Ajig sesang-i mollajuneun akkaun nae ileum

Bam doemyeon tteo tteo dol-adanyeo achim haeilh-eun

Dalcheoleom bicheoleom eum-agcheoleom, oeloum pineun

Sseog-eun us-eum-e jan juleumjin nae nunga-e tteunguleum-eun

Nae gomin kkyeo nikotin kkyeo nae meoli wilo buseojyeo buseojyeo

Sseog-eun us-eum-e jan juleumjin nae nunga-e tteunguleum-eun

Nae gomin kkyeo nikotin kkyeo nae meoli wilo buseojyeo buseojyeo

Buseojyeo



Sungan-eul yeong-wonhi sal su issdamyeon

Naega anin geol wonhae nae salm-ui jeol ban-eun

Jumadeung eonjeolie jjochgi deus pihaneun

Nae beoleuscheoleom nan ajigkkajido honjaga pyeonhae

Jajongam daesin mogsolil nop-ideon

Nae malsuga julgo nan ib-eul deo damul-eo himkkeos

Ibsul-eul kkaemul-eo bojiman ib-eul beollineun sangcheo

Apeumman-i seongjang-ui mitgeoleum-ilkka

Ijen nan salamdeul us-eumdo museowo

Du nun-eul galigo ippal-eul deuleonaejanh-a jeomjeom

Sog ma-eum-eul sumgyeo nal gatjanhge bomyeo

Dadeul bangabge us-eo oelyeo cham ttaghae boyeo

Nobody said it be like this

Jeongdab-eun i eum-ag-e iss-eo

Midneun daelo pyeolchyeojil geolan muchaeg-imhan gam-eon

Geu modeun geos-i naleul wihae jonjaehalji gwayeon



Yo nobody said it be like this

Yo nobody said it be like this

Yo nobody said it be like this

Yo nobody said it be like this

Amudo naege malhaejuji anh-ass-eo

Nado mudji anh-ass-eo

Amudo naege mul-eoboji anh-ass-eo

Nado deudji anh-ass-eo
